## Chapter 3 Exercise 1
Four people are to be arranged in a row to have their picture taken. In how
many ways can this be done?
```
First position can be filled by any of the 4 people, second by remaining 3, second by remaining 2 and last by
remaining 1.

So total ways = 4 * 3 * 2 * 1 = 24
```
